sentences.sContent: To a newcomer the scene seemed an easy contrast between the country's haves and have-nots – but then the gipsy women climbed into the back seat of a brand new Mercedes.
sentences.sContent_eng: To a newcomer the scene seemed an easy contrast between the country's haves and have-nots – but then the gipsy women climbed into the back seat of a brand new Mercedes.
sentences.sCn: 新来者会把这样的景象看作是这个国家贫富之间的对照，但是这些吉普赛女人却坐进了一辆崭新奔驶轿车的后座。

sentences.sContent: Opposite a group of gipsy women were walking down the street.
sentences.sContent_eng: Opposite a group of gipsy women were walking down the street.
sentences.sCn: 马路对面有几个吉普赛女人在街上行走。
